main event: A military observation of an intense light that changed colors and size, reported on 29 December 1960 in Japan.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 minutes,The object changed color from white to cherry red to green to blue and back to white,The size of the object appeared to fluctuate between 30 feet and 3 feet,The object faded to the rear of the aircraft,The observation was conducted by military personnel using ground radar.
